News.headline: Dagenham and Redbridge Golf Day 2017
News.short_description: Ever fancied having a round of golf with a member of the Dagenham & Redbridge playing or management staff? Well now is your chance!
News.description:
There are now places available for the annual Daggers Golf Day which will take place on Monday 24th April at Maylands Golf Club in Romford.

The beautifully constructed 18 hole, par 71 championship golf course provides the perfect setting for a day of competition and fun with the Daggers players and management.

Golfers will go around in groups of four including a member of the first team playing squad or coaching staff getting involved in the action.

A full day’s programme of entertainment is on offer commencing with bacon rolls and tea or coffee in the clubhouse before the tee off.

Teams will then be invited to play 18-holes and on completion all players can return to the club house to enjoy a well-deserved pre-dinner drink, followed by a two course meal and the all-important awards ceremony.

Tee off times will begin at 1.30pm and teams of 3 are available for just £195.00 with individual places only £65.00.

If you are not a golfer, you can attend the evening two course meal and Q&A session with John Still for only £25.

For further information or to make a booking please contact the commercial department on 0208 592 1549 ext 33 or email commercial@daggers.co.uk

Alternatively download your booking form here and email to commercial@daggers.co.uk or post to Commercial Department, Dagenham & Redbridge FC, Victoria Road, Dagenham, Essex, RM10 7XL.
